title: Asking if there are any restrictions on what the ticket covers

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Hello, how may I assist you today? Are you interested in purchasing tickets for our attraction?
turns.user_response_option_en: "Can I ask if the ticket covers all attractions?
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 안녕하세요, 무엇을 도와드릴까요? 어트랙션 티켓 구매에 관심이 있으신가요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: "티켓에 모든 어트랙션이 포함되어 있는지 물어봐도 되나요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Our ticket covers all attractions in the park, but there might be additional fees for certain activities such as the zip line or horseback riding.
